titleStmt.title: Something concerning the proceedings of Thomas Willmate, vicar of the parish of Bromsgrove, in the county of Worcester, against me John Boweter, (who am a prisoner for the testimony of Christ Jesus) with a salutation of love to my loving and kind neighbours.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (John Bowater), d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from p. 4.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London.
